title: What if item bans existed, and each team could ban one tier 3 item per game, which would you ban?
body:
Certainly would lead to interesting situations i think

limited to tier 3 items nobody needs boots to be banned now do we , . .

But i would probably ban {{item:3071}} it's such a generalist item and bought on most ad's so i would throw them a curve ball now people gotta go buy their own arpen again too

which item would be your ban pick
